DOC.brief_title: The Measurement Insulin Resistance Peritoneal Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Medically stable receive stable PD ≥ 3 month ; BMI ≤ 45 ; Most recent Kt/V ≥1.7 Tccr ≥ 50l/week/1.73m2 ; On Glucose lactatebuffered PD solution consistent glucose exposure . Pregnancy breastfeeding ; Intolerance study protocol ; Severe , unstable , active , chronic inflammation disease ( active infection , active connective tissue disorder , active cancer , HIV , liver disease ) ; Chronic use antiinflammatory medication except low dose ( < 10mg/d ) prednisone ; Severe hypokalemia ( K+ level < 3.0 mEq/L ) ; Hypercalcemia ( Ca++ level > 11.0 mg/dL ) ; Have glycogen storage disease ; Intolerant maltose isomaltose ; Allergic cornstarch icodextrin ; Recent abdominal surgery past 30 day ; Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( COPD ) Interstitial lung disease ; InsulinDependent Diabetes Mellitus ( IDDM ) .
